extendedInfo.description: JustCloud gives you access to the Cloud wherever you are. JustCloud is one of the leading cloud storage and file synchronization providers on the internet. With cutting edge software and innovative development, JustCloud is constantly adding to its already rich product feature set. Access all of your files from anywhere using the JustCloud Android application. Listen to your music, watch your videos, open your documents and view your photos all from one easy to use application. But the fun doesnât stop there, Just Cloud also gives you all of these great features: * Take photos and upload them directly to your SyncFolder * Protect your data via our app passcode lock * Easily save new files to your SyncFolder * Create a voice memo * Backup your camera roll * Draw a doodle and publish them to Facebook or Twitter * Share your photos with Facebook, Twitter or Email * Take notes and email them to friends or colleagues * Browse and open all of your backed up files * Browse and open any of your synced files * Listen to your music files * Plus lots more If you donât already have a Just Cloud account, you can easily create one from inside the application and get some free storage space to get you started. To get even more access to your files make sure you install the desktop application on your Mac or Windows PC. For more information please visit www.justcloud.com

reviews.title: Worst ever
reviews.comment: To much pop ups in the web and desktop application, to much limitations like max file size 1gb, speed limitation, if you want more spread you have to buy a add on, to much add on, support completely useless, they never answer all the questions, I\'m testing some cloud storage services and this look the best one at first view but was the worst one!! Not recommended at all!!!
reviews.author: Marcio Maia

reviews.title: Misleading
reviews.comment: My initial effort at using JustCloud was terrible. It claims 15gb storage for backup... I tried to backup well under a gig. At 187megs, it simply balked and has proudly touted that figure at me in all of the ads it\'s throwing at me every 15 minutes on my computer after I synced the two. Not to mention the announcements that the service is only free for 15 days. I don\'t mind paying if the company is upfront and honest.  Going back to Drive. At least you really get what Google claims you will.  Uninsta Google
reviews.author: Victoria Styles

I have received a Great service well worth getting nice to know all your photos are save if thing\'s go wrong. If you want things in life get your card out and  pay it\'s not much compared to losing all your photos or document so video footage you\'re call

reviews.title: Can you say bait and switch?
reviews.comment: As has been pointed out, they claim Free account, Unlimited Cloud Storage... however they neglect to tell you until you sign up that to get the unlimited storage, you must pay at a minimum $4.95 a month!  Thst certainly is NOT free and unlimited! In fact the only give you 15mb for free! Anything more then that and you must break out your credit card! What a scam! Don\'t waste your time!
reviews.author: John Durchak

reviews.title: Have to pay for everything
reviews.comment: Have to buy storage. Then buy sync amounts. And still will not upload everything. Just a scam
reviews.author: mark edgar

reviews.title: Fine... Until you want to cancel
reviews.comment: Hadn\'t realised I was still paying for this so emailed to cancel 4 days ago. All I get back are countless emails offering me discounts etc and nobody will actually cancel! Sent them two more emails 2 days ago to say I just wanted to cancel and nobody has got back to me. Had to go through PayPal to cancel my payments. I\'d stay away and just go with dropbox or icloud.
reviews.author: B Williams

reviews.title: Many bogus reviews. BAIT AND SWITCH
reviews.comment: The majority of these four and five star reviews are bogus reviews the service is a scam they get you in with promises of free unlimited data storage and then they do I switch it out for you having to pay classic example of a bait and switch
reviews.author: Joseph Oprysko

reviews.comment: Started to back up my PC at 1100 hrs. it has been running ffor 9 hours still only 7% complete. I have upgraded to what is supposed to be fast. hate tohow slow the other is
reviews.author: Chester Kingston

reviews.title: Horrible app & Company!
reviews.comment: Just got an email saying that they decided to go \"free\" and give you 1GB of space free. I logged in and it said my \"free trial\" was over and I had to pay like $20/month for 75GB of storage.... plus you can only upload from a mobile device over Wifi... SCAM!!! Uninstalling!
reviews.author: Francis Yans

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Perfect
